column4: hello, is there some way to making a link to a ftp with name+passwd using lftp?
by "link", do you mean a permanent one ?
I mean, when i type in console something like: ftp.site.com I dont have to type a name and passwd everytime
I would advise you to use SSH for remote connections, as that is much more secure.. SSH comes with a secure copy program (scp) that works just like normal copy
there are several ways to avoid having to enter authentication data with SSH
and you want to do that remotely ? then you need SSH
